subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Scarlet Kights never seemed to recover from a play on Oct. 16, when defensive tackle Eric LeGrand was paralyzed while making a tackle against Army.
snippet: The Scarlet Kights never seemed to recover from a play on Oct. 16, when defensive tackle Eric LeGrand was paralyzed while making a tackle against Army.
